title: 2Bed 1Bath Unit on the border of Noe Valley and Mission
posting_body: 2 Bedroom with the possible option for 3 Bedroom and 1 Bathroom on the sunny border of Noe Valley and Mission District, in-between Guerrero and Valencia.
Hardwood floors, tall ceiling, and Bay windows in each room.
Conveniently located 2 blocks from 24th street, 3 blocks from BART, close to HWY 101 and 280, walking distance to Noe Valley's 24th street with Whole Foods Market and shops.
1-2 blocks from Mission and Valencia shops that are filled with bars and restaurants.
There is a convenient organic Market right on the corner.
Near all the HI-Tech bus pick-up.
Monthly income of 2.5x the amount of rent

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
Street parking with a parking permit is available.
